channel.title: EWS on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in EWS on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Day 3 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Delay-embedding Phase/State space reconstruction Recurrence Quantification Analysis Early Warning Signals (EWS) of phase transitions Tentative time table for Day 3 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Quantifying temporal patterns in unordered categorical time series data FH Categorical Auto-Recurrence Quantification Analysis 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.00-12.00 Assignments Categorical RQA, Surrogate analysis 12.

item.title: Day 5 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: The idiographic system method in psychopathology Process monitoring (experience sampling) Dynamic complexity (Multiplex) Recurrence networks Early warning signals of phase transitions in multivariate time series data Tentative time table for Day 5 When What Who Topics Notes 09:00-10:00 Intro Idiographic Methods FH 10:00-10:30 Guest lecture: Dynamic complexity as an early warning signal in psychopathology MO Dynamic Complexity, Multivariate ESM data 10.
